name: Neon Beat Rider
description:
Ｒｉｄｅ ｔｈｅ Ｂｅａｔｓ！
Neon Beat Rider is a high-energy rhythm game with a powerful synthwave soundtrack and a playable story set in a retro-future dystopia!

Play as the Beat Rider, a high-speed courier with a decade of experience working for Shade Corp., the largest industrial conglomerate around in the year 20xx. Rush through a wide variety of neon-blasted environments as you follow a branching, multiple-ending storyline!

Play along to an addictive soundtrack by synthwave musicians A Space Love Adventure and Droid Bishop, or let your own music files generate a track for you to conquer!
